resources.string: Exclusive and comfortable Pereira, who offers guests wonderful experiences through your senses.

Located in the most prestigious area of the city of Pereira, just 80 Mtrs from the Plaza de Bolivar, surrounded by financial, shopping centers, restaurants and nightlife.
Five-star hotel is located just 10 minutes from Matecaña International Airport and offers a spa with Turkish baths, a modern gym and massage rooms.

It is in the Confamiliar recreational center where you can interact with the animals, wildlife and flora and agricultural life of the region.
(town located about 45 minutes from Pereira) has an ecological trail, decorated with the flora and fauna of the region where you can see the life of the coffee family.
Birth Otun River, which crosses the Risaralda capital with spectacular landscapes, is attractive frailejón forest.
4,240 hectares of high Andean forest are conserved, with a variety of fauna, flora and beautiful waterfalls. It is the habitat of the spectacled bear.

Pereira is the capital of Risaraldas, if we compare the number of population of Pereira with the department, it can be concluded is the number 1 of the 14 municipalities that are in the department, accounting for 49.4206 percent of the total population of the department Risaraldas.A national level, the city of Pereira ranks as number 10 of the 1,119 municipalities in Colombia and there is a 1.0342 percent of the total population of the country.
Like a night of unforgettable party with your friends? For Pereira has the best places in his famous Avenida Circunvalar; where the best bars and nightclubs in the city.

Have you tried the arepas de chocolo? The Real Street Arepa is a great place to eat together. Located at Km 11 Via Pereira-Cerritos. You will find excellent restaurants whose specialty is roasted delicious arepa de chocolo.

If you love the adrenaline and extreme sports and want a great place to share with family and friends. Karting Cross is an amusement park where anyone can have fun, either on the slopes, on the roller coaster, playing paintball or other extreme sports.
